text_block_list.text: —— Ah man, I missed my opportunity again…!

Just when someone had finally caught my interest at 
the Selection Race, she had already signed a contract 
with another trainer before I could approach her…
choice_data_list: Ah… just my luck, I guess…

text_block_list.text: Ooh～ That was a mighty big sigh!

text_block_list.name: Jolly Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
Ahahah! Sorry, did I startle you? I was taking a nap over there 
in the shade, but I couldn't help being curious.

text_block_list.name: Jolly Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
So, something making you feel down? Wanna tell me about it? 
Just putting it into words can make you feel better.
choice_data_list: <size=32>Ah, it's not really something to discuss with students…</size>

text_block_list.name: Jolly Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Hm-hmm, that so～? Must be a work-related problem then? Or could it be… that you witnessed some dark secrets of the academy that you can't disclose?!

text_block_list.name: Jolly Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
Ahahaa! I see, I see. Work troubles, eh～? 
Being a trainer sounds like a tough job. 
Are you training anyone right now?
choice_data_list: I-I did have a girl who caught my eye, but…

text_block_list.name: Jolly Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
But? I'll assume you didn't end up as her trainer. 
So what happened? Tell me more.

Before I knew it, I found myself opening up… 
As I shared my thoughts, it felt like a weight 
was being lifted off my shoulders.

text_block_list.name: Jolly Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
How about going for a change of pace first, and then 
trying your luck again at the next Selection Race?

text_block_list.name: Jolly Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, then I'll see you there! 
'Cause guess who's running in the next race～!

text_block_list.name: Jolly Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
Ahaha. And it's my carefully timed debut race to boot! 
Curious yet～? …Heh, I gotta promote myself a lil', right? 
Well anyway, feel free to come and see me race!

Charmed by the horsegirl's playful aura and contagious 
laughter, a question slipped from my mouth…

text_block_list.name: Jolly Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Hmm, mine? It's ——

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Today's center of attention is undoubtedly Mejiro Ryan! She looks to be in impeccable condition, too…! Aagh, the anticipation is killing me……

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer B
text_block_list.text:
Huh? Is that another Mejiro horsegirl next to her? 
What was her name, again…? Mejiro something…

—— The horsegirl I met on the rooftop earlier 
came from the prestigious Mejiro family.

The Mejiro family is a prestigious family that has produced 
numerous exceptional horsegirls bearing the name "Mejiro".

Among them, Mejiro Ryan, Mejiro McQueen, and a few other 
particularly exceptional talents have gripped public attention 
since their enrollment.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Oh, it's you! Great to see you! Cheer for me, 'kay～? 
I'm putting my best foot forward today!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Well, not that I can compete with Ryan in terms of popularity. 
Ahaha, guess I just don't stand out that much!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
… But hey, watch me. After all, I'm a Mejiro horsegirl as well. 
If I don't show my resolve here, it'd disgrace our great name, 
isn't that right?

Her unwavering cheerful demeanor hid any trace of worry. 
Nevertheless, I thought I caught a tense expression flashing 
across her face. Then the race got underway ——

Mejiro Palmer immediately took the lead, looking to 
escape from the rest. Her graceful and flawless form 
was obvious at a glance.
choice_data_list:
(I suppose her way of running 
befits her family's prestige.)

text_block_list.text: However, as the race approached its final leg ——

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: —— This is it! Haaaaaaaaaaaaa—!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: ……! Haa, haa, haah, haa…!

As each horsegirl unleashed their final spurt, they overtook 
her one by one. Her visibly strained expression contrasted 
with her beautiful and perfectly composed form.
It was as if she was "running too properly", or playing it safe ——

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Haa… Haa… ahhhh, damn it! Didn't think I'd finish last…!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
That's terrible! For a Mejiro horsegirl 
to perform like this… everyone will ——

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
We had no doubts about the winner! Goes to show that 
the Mejiro name is not just for show! So, getting right 
into it, can we talk for a moment?

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer B
text_block_list.text:
She said it, we would not expect less of the Mejiro family! 
You are just as fast as I expected! I would absolutely love 
to have you on our team…!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Whoah… could we slow down things a little so that 
everyone can get their turn? We're getting in the 
way here, so maybe we could talk over there…!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: …… Ahhahah. Why was I getting so worked up about bringing disgrace to the Mejiro name? No one's even bothering with me.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Ah, what a relief! Turns out that I didn't have 
to worry about all that. If you're not worthy of 
attention… you can't disappoint anyone either.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: …… Who am I kidding.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
… Oh! Sorry about that, ahahah. Thanks for coming! How was 
the race? Did you find any promising talents? Well, actually, 
of course — Ryan is obviously the number one candidate～!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
It's okay, it's okay, I understand! There are so many 
talented girls in the Mejiro family, y'know. It's a given 
that I wouldn't get any attention!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
But of course, I'm not going to give up. If things aren't 
working out at the moment, then I'll just have to become 
stronger. There's no time to be feeling sad — none at all!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
I'll have to resume my training right away! 
First, I need to build more stamina, thoroughly 
review the fundamentals, and then ——
choice_data_list: Is that really what you want……?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Huh…?

After observing the race, a realization dawned on me. 
Perhaps she is affected by the pressure stemming from 
having to live up to the esteemed Mejiro name.

I felt like, as a result of that pressure, her running stiffens up. 
While it is a good thing to be faithful to the fundamentals, 
every so often, exceptions arise…
choice_data_list: <size=32>There might be a way of running that suits you better…</size>
<size=32>There might be a way of running that suits you better…</size>

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: … Suits me better? What do you mean by that…?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
…… Ah, thanks for letting me know!! 
I'll… try giving it some thought.
